Demoralized from back-to-back losses, the Challengers vow to take home a victory at the "Repo Race" challenge. Two players' spots in the game are extinguished during the "Burnout" Ruins. An unlikely romance is sparked between two Champions.

episodes.name: Girls Gone Wild
episodes.overview: When Katie discovers a dirty plunger in her bed, she goes ballistic in her hunt for the prankster. A longstanding feud between Champions Tonya and Veronica meets a shocking end. One team's hopes for a win go down in flames at the "Burning Bridges" challenge, when a careless player blows it for their entire team.

episodes.name: Reversal of Fortune
episodes.overview: Wes makes a drastic move when he senses that his girlfriend, KellyAnne, is getting too close to her ex-boyfriend, Cohutta. A crafty competitor manages to escape being voted into the "Spool" Ruins, while another is completely blindsided by her team's decision.

episodes.name: Ruining On Empty
episodes.overview: Controversial Champion Johnny realizes that his biggest hurdle in the game is himself. Veronica is rattled when she learns of Susie and Johanna's plot to send her into the Ruins for the rest of the game. The teams fight for sweet victory at the "Fruits of Your Labor" challenge.

episodes.name: Silence Of The Ruins
episodes.overview: Brad becomes increasingly frustrated with his team's losing streak and hopes to lead his team to victory at the "Rotary Club" challenge. A Champion makes a deal with his teammates that could keep him out of the Ruins for the rest of the game. After flying under the radar for the entire game, Casey is finally called out by her aggravated team.

episodes.name: Thai Me Up! Thai Me Down!
episodes.overview: A night of drunken partying turns violent when two players from opposing teams get into a fistfight. Susie finds herself at odds with her male teammates. Old tensions between Dunbar and KellyAnne are reignited and threaten the foundation of the Challengers' team.

episodes.name: Muay So-Called Ruins
episodes.overview: Dunbar struggles with being the last remaining man on the Challenger team and must fight for survival in the game. Johnny contemplates drastic measures to get rid of one of his own teammates. Players battle in the last Ruins to secure a spot in the finale.

episodes.name: Good Thai and Good Luck
episodes.overview: The Champions become paranoid that they could lose in the end if one worrisome team member fails to pull their weight.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview:
The reunion was hosted by Maria Menounos and was taped at the MTV Studios.

Cast members that attended were Landon, Evan, Rachel, Brittini, Aneesa, Kim, Dunbar, Brad, Tori, Diem, Mark, Jenn & Paula. The many relationships/hookups, fights & missions were discussed.

episodes.name: The S#!t They Should Have Shown

18.name: The Ruins
18.overview:
Real World Road Rules Challenge: The Ruins is the eighteenth season of the MTV reality television game show, Real World/Road Rules Challenge, and follows The Duel II. The Ruins took place in Phuket, Thailand, with former cast members from MTV's The Real World and Road Rules competing along with several cast members from the Fresh Meat challenge. This season was played in the format of two teams: Champions and Challengers. Players on the Champions team had won at least one previous challenge, while players on the Challengers team had never won a challenge.

This is the last season to use Real World/Road Rules in the on-screen title, before being shortened to The Challenge in the 19th season.

The season premiered on September 30, 2009 and concluded with the "S#!t They Should Have Shown" special on December 23, 2009.

episodes.name: Meet the Meat
episodes.overview: The newest crop of 'Fresh Meat' arrives in British Columbia to compete in a grueling combine day.

episodes.name: Nice to Meat You
episodes.overview: Thirteen Challenge alumni arrive in British Columbia and learn that they will be paired up with brand new players -- Fresh Meat -- and compete together for a share of the $300,000 grand prize. But can these veteran competitors tame their overzealous new partners? Two archrivals, Kenny and Wes, make an unholy alliance in order to annihilate their competition. One pair becomes the first to be eliminated at The Exile.

episodes.name: Meating of the Minds
episodes.overview: The "I'll Be There For You" challenge yields surprising results when one team seizes control of the game, forcing the house to split into two powerful rival camps. Theresa walks a dangerous line when she seduces Wes -- while he has no clue that she has already thrown herself at his mortal enemy, Kenny. Close allies face each other in the grueling "Weight for Me" Exile.

episodes.name: Sloppy Ho's
episodes.overview: Fearing that she may be next to face The Exile, a worried Paula takes her frustrations out on her partner, Jeff, and then hopes to gain immunity at the "Water Logged" challenge. When Mandi calls out Jenn for her questionable voting record, Jenn flips out, and in the process, her true allegiance is revealed.

episodes.name: Meats 'N Potatoes
episodes.overview: At the "King of the Hill" challenge, one player faces an injury that could potentially take their team out of the game. Wes and Evelyn successfully lure a member of Kenny's alliance into becoming a double agent. The winners of The Exile return to the house with a secret that could shock the entire house.

episodes.name: Road Kill
episodes.overview: The pressures of the game take their toll on one extra-paranoid player and things go from bad to worse when he is later betrayed by his best friend. Players take a nerve-wracking leap of faith at the "Drop Out" challenge. Two teams race for survival at the "Lost and Found" Exile and the results are the closest yet.

episodes.name: Checkmeat!
episodes.overview: In an effort to protect himself from exile, Wes offers up two members of his own alliance. Will this betrayal ultimately lead to his downfall?

episodes.name: Trimming The Fat
episodes.overview: A major power shift sends two unlikely teams into exile, permanently changing the course of the competition. And Ev calls out Wes on his relationship with Theresa.

episodes.name: Spoiled Rotten Meat
episodes.overview: With Wes gone, Evelyn stands alone. But she continues to wheel and deal, hoping to save her team from what might be the toughest exile yet.

episodes.name: All U Can Eat Stakes
episodes.overview: It's the last Challenge before the final competition, and the stakes are high. But no one expects the game twist that will determine which two teams are sent to the final Exile.

episodes.name: Well Done, Meat
episodes.overview: It's down to the final four with $300,000 on the line...and a mountain between the challengers and the cash.

episodes.name: Czech Yourself Before You Wreck Yourself
episodes.overview: The season kicks off with 30 fan favorites heading to Prague, where they're divided into three player-selected teams. After each challenge, the losing teams must send a girl and a guy to the Gulag battle arena to determine who remains in the competition.

episodes.name: Newbie Doobie Doo
episodes.overview: A Brain Busters challenge puts Abram's leadership to the test; Chet must choose between his loyalty to his team and his new crush; the Gulag threatens two budding romances.

episodes.name: Karma's A Bitch
episodes.overview: Katie gets a black eye during a Bedhead challenge, while Johnny gets one in a bar brawl in Prague.

episodes.name: Swat the Hell
episodes.overview: The Red Team worries that one of their members is forming an alliance with the enemy. Meanwhile, members of the Blue Team are willing to sacrifice friendships for cash.

episodes.name: Couching Tyger, Hidden Danimal
episodes.overview: A "Surf's Up" challenge is featured.

episodes.name: Where the Red Team Blows
episodes.overview: Infighting on the Red Team threatens to tear it apart; Camila makes the mistake of revealing her secret vote.

episodes.name: Hell Hath No Fury
episodes.overview: A terrifying challenge takes place 100 feet in the air. Later, things get personal when the teams decide who to send to the Gulag.

episodes.name: Back With a Vengeance
episodes.overview: Laurel and Sarah consider throwing a challenge so they can get rid of their weakest player. Meanwhile, the game starts to take its toll on Brad and Tori's relationship.

episodes.name: Always a Bridesmaid
episodes.overview: Johnny and CT face off in the Gulag; Sarah and Laurel hatch another plan to get rid of Cara Maria.

episodes.name: Czechmate
episodes.overview: Two popular players head to the last Gulag in the finale. Then, the remaining competitors race for the grand prize in a grueling final challenge that sends two players to the hospital.

episodes.name: The Challenge: Cutthroat Reunion
episodes.overview: Hosted by Maria Menounos. The cast members who attended the reunion were Luke, Sarah, Brad, Tori, Paula, Tyler, Dunbar, Derrick, Emily, Laurel, Abram, Cara Maria, Eric, Johnny and Jenn.

episodes.name: The S#!% They Should've Shown
episodes.overview: Watch all the footage that didn't make it to air on The Challenge: Cutthroat.

20.name: Cutthroat
20.overview:
The Challenge: Cutthroat is the 20th season of the MTV reality game show, The Challenge.

Filmed in Prague, Czech Republic, Cutthroat features a first-ever three-team format with cast members from The Real World, Road Rules, and The Challenge. The season premiered on Wednesday, October 6, 2010

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: Twenty-eight Challenge competitors arrive in Costa Rica only to find out that they will be teamed up with their biggest rivals. And a fight on night two sends one Challenger home early.

episodes.name: Through The Looking Glass
episodes.overview: On the first men's elimination day, the competition is crushing, and everyone is surprised at who ends up fighting for their lives in the Jungle. Jonna and Camilla have it out, but it's Jasmine who takes the fight to the next level.

episodes.name: Underdog Day Afternoon
episodes.overview: A strong team struggles on the girls' elimination day.

episodes.name: D-DAY
episodes.overview: The guys plot to send CT home, while Laurel and Mandi vie for his attention. Also: Kenny worries that he's lost his competitive edge.

episodes.name: Ill Communication
episodes.overview: Things get heated between teammates Jasmine and Jonna, and a blowout between the girls changes the game. Meanwhile, Adam pursues Jenn.

episodes.name: Blow Up
episodes.overview: Evan considers throwing a challenge as part of the guys' plan to get rid of CT. Meanwhile, CT finds himself in the middle of a love triangle with Mandi and Laurel.

episodes.name: Blood on the Dance Floor
episodes.overview: One alliance begins to crumble after a brawl between Jenn and Cara Maria. Later, a surprise twist changes the game.

episodes.name: Cry for Me, Argentina
episodes.overview: Some players crack under pressure as the final challenge approaches; Laurel defends Cara Maria after Wes and Paula drive her to tears.

episodes.name: The Storm Before the Storm
episodes.overview: Two strong male teams fight tooth and nail in "T-Bone," the last elimination of the season. A clue sends the remaining twelve Challengers off to another destination, where they begin the toughest Final in Challenge history.

episodes.name: At the End of the World
episodes.overview: With the Final underway, teams thrive or fail based on their ability to work together. One male team and one female team will claim the title of Challenge champions.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The "Rivals" cast reunites and dishes about what went down on the 21st season.

episodes.name: The S#!@ They Should Have Shown
episodes.overview: Outtakes and previously unseen footage for the 21st season.

21.name: Rivals
21.overview:
The Challenge: Rivals is the 21st season of the MTV reality game show, The Challenge. Rivals takes place in Costa Rica, Argentina, and Patagonia. The season used former cast members from The Real World and The Challenge.

Rivals marked the first season of The Challenge to not include any cast members from cancelled series Road Rules. The season featured an incendiary format in which players were teamed with their arch enemies from past seasons of The Real World and The Challenge. The season premiered on June 22, 2011

episodes.name: The Pre-Game
episodes.overview: Kenny Santucci joins former Challenge competitors Mike, Laurel, Tyler and Jenn to introduce this season's group of exes and all the drama they bring down to the Dominican Republic.

episodes.name: Love Is a Battlefield
episodes.overview: Season 22 opens as 26 players arrive in the Dominican Republic and learn they'll be paired up with their exes to compete for their share of a $300,000 grand prize.

episodes.name: What's Love Got to Do With It?
episodes.overview: Unrequited love is in the air as Wes pines after Mandi; a drunken action by one player has devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Where Did Our Love Go?
episodes.overview: Abram is insecure about his relationship with Cara Maria; Paula and Dunbar appear to be getting over their issues; two teams may go home.

episodes.name: Love the Way You Lie
episodes.overview: Robin has an emotional breakdown; CT and Diem try to repair their relationship; bad blood resurfaces.

episodes.name: Crazy in Love
episodes.overview: A jealous Camila goes on a drunken rampage; the relationship between Paula and Ty heats up; Abram and Cara Maria continue to struggle with their undefined relationship.

episodes.name: Tainted Love
episodes.overview: Paula and Ty take their flirtation to the next level, creating tension with his teammate, Emily. Also: CT and Diem tear each other down; Rachel and Aneesa struggle with trust issues.

episodes.name: Love and Marriage
episodes.overview: The exes compete in a wedding-theme challenge. Then, things take a dark turn when a racially charged incident occurs, tearing the house apart.

episodes.name: On the Wings of Love
episodes.overview: The Top 4 teams are revealed before the penultimate challenge, where the players nearly get blown away while fighting for a spot in the finals.

episodes.name: Will You Still Love Me Tomorrow?
episodes.overview: The final three teams are revealed after a grueling battle in the Dome. The players then travel to Iceland, where the final challenge will be held.

episodes.name: I Will Always Love You
episodes.overview: In Iceland, the Top 3 teams embark on a rigorous, long-distance race for the $300,000 grand prize in the Season 22 finale.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The "Battle of the Exes" cast reunite to dish about their stay in the Dominican Republic.

episodes.name: The S#!@ They Should Have Shown
episodes.overview: Outtakes and previously unseen footage from the "Battle of the Exes.

22.name: Battle of the Exes
22.overview: The Challenge: Battle of the Exes is the 22nd season of the MTV reality game show, The Challenge. It takes place in the Dominican Republic and Iceland, with former cast members from MTV's The Real World, Road Rules, and The Challenge competing.  The season premiered on January 25, 2012, and concluded on April 4, 2012, with the Reunion special.

episodes.name: Tis the Season
episodes.overview: Cast members from The Real World's most memorable seasons come together for an all out battle for Real World supremacy, but an early twist could shake things up. Plus- a surprise hook up and a fight that involves the entire house.

episodes.name: The Perks of Being a Rookie
episodes.overview: Divorced exes Danny and Melinda struggle to work together and help shine a light on Knight and Jemmye's similarly fractured relationship. Major alliances are revealed and one team crumbles under the pressure of elimination.

episodes.name: What Happens in Vegas...
episodes.overview: Two new couplings start brewing in the the Challenge house, one of which threatens to break apart a team AND ruin an entire alliance. And other season continues to break down, with one member exploding on her teammates.

episodes.name: The Dark Knight
episodes.overview: Knight launches a full on attack to get inside Nany's head and ends up tearing the house and his own relationship with Jemmye apart. And a pending elimination may spell the end for one of the house's budding romances.

episodes.name: N-A-R-C-I-S-S-I-S-T-I-C
episodes.overview: A trip into the Arena leaves two relationships in shambles. And after a trivia competition catapults challengers into the waters below, one team is forced to send members of their own alliance into elimination.

episodes.name: Going Insane
episodes.overview: Tensions mount between Frank and Alton. Later, Alton asks to be sent into the arena.

episodes.name: I Do Not Like You Sam I Am
episodes.overview: Frank and Zach berate Sam for her poor performance in a challenge; a surprising romance takes shape.

episodes.name: Honey, I'm Homeless
episodes.overview: Team members compete in an eating challenge.

episodes.name: The Chronicles of Nanyia
episodes.overview: Two teams face off in a diving competition.

episodes.name: A Woman Scorned
episodes.overview: The teams take desperate measures.

episodes.name: I Like to Move It, Move It
episodes.overview: The final four teams travel to Namibia, a country in southwestern Africa.

episodes.name: Operation: Desert Scorn
episodes.overview: Three teams compete in the final challenge.

23.name: Battle of the Seasons
23.overview: The Challenge: Battle of the Seasons is the 23rd season of the MTV reality game show, The Challenge. Although sharing the same name as the show's 5th season, Battle of the Seasons, unlike other sequel seasons is not distinguished as part "II" as the Season has a completely different format as well as different rules. The season took place in Bodrum, Turkey and Swakopmund, Namibia.

episodes.name: Rumble in the Jungle
episodes.overview: 16 pairs of rivals arrive in Thailand and the rookies cause trouble quickly, leading to a fight in the pool, two surprising hookups involving bad boy CT, and one competitor going home early- the fate of her partner up in the air.

episodes.name: New Girl
episodes.overview: The rivals get closer than ever before in a sexy challenge that has each contestant literally tied upside down to each other. And one of the new girls has a freak out when her hookup with a veteran bad boy doesn't go as planned.

episodes.name: The Dark Knight Rises
episodes.overview: A fight breaks out after one of the competitors is mocked.

episodes.name: Mortuusequusphobia
episodes.overview: A dangerous elimination event is faced by the contestants.

episodes.name: What the Phuket?!
episodes.overview: One challenger gets homesick and takes his frustration out on everyone around him. A strategic fumble in voting leads one challenger to accidentally send her hookup into elimination.

episodes.name: Revenge Is a Dish Best Not Serve
episodes.overview: Competitors reveal their true feelings about each other, creating tension; a team's trustworthiness is questioned.

episodes.name: Thrilla in Camila
episodes.overview: A team is pushed by exes; a deliberations vote breaks an alliance; a player's motives are questioned.

episodes.name: Diemnesia
episodes.overview: CT and Diem's romance ignites; the final guys challenge starts a war of intimidation among Johnny, Wes and CT.

episodes.name: True Colors
episodes.overview: The losing female teams are desperate to secure their places in the final; Diem learns she has been manipulated.

episodes.name: Final Destination
episodes.overview: The ladies work hard in the last elimination challenge; TJ throws a curve ball before the final.

episodes.name: The Island of Misfit Challengers
episodes.overview: The teams must leave the luxury of the yacht to battle obstacles on Nightmare Island.

episodes.name: The Challenge: Rivals II Reunion
episodes.overview: Hosted by Jonny Moseley. The cast members who attended the reunion were Wes, CT, Paula, Emily, Cara Maria, Diem, Aneesa, Frank, Johnny, Knight, Preston, Jemmye, Camila, Jordan and Marlon.

24.name: Rivals 2
24.overview: The Challenge: Rivals II is the 24th season of the MTV reality game show, The Challenge. The season take places in Phuket, Thailand, with former cast members from MTV's The Real World and The Challenge competing. The season followed the same format as the original Rivals challenge, with players paired up with arch enemies from past seasons of The Real World and The Challenge.

episodes.name: Live Free or Die
episodes.overview: 28 competitors arrive in South America and are shocked to learn that the challenge will be an individual game, forcing players to ditch their usual strategies and fear for what's ahead.

episodes.name: Love In The Fast Lane
episodes.overview: Close friends fight after a night of celebration; a budding romance ends.

episodes.name: You Be Illin'
episodes.overview: The house celebrates a fake wedding between 2 flirtatious cast members with a night of bachelor and bachelorette party debauchery. At the bar crawl challenge, everyone is shocked when a player is sent home before it even begins.

episodes.name: Inadequate
episodes.overview: One player's egotistical attitude creates tension in the house and the competitors literally go head to head to knock out a victory in this week's challenge.

episodes.name: Stripes
episodes.overview: With strong players falling left and right, a rope swinging challenge proves to be the toughest one yet and allows the group to bravely send two veterans into eliminations.

episodes.name: Not So Trivial Pursuits
episodes.overview: Tension rises between hot-headed veterans and one cocky rookie, and the competitors are put through the ultimate trivia test as their safety hangs by a thread.

episodes.name: Pride Before The Wall
episodes.overview: When a rivalry comes to a head, the group is anxious to see whether one player can settle it for good by pulling off either the boldest or most boneheaded move in Challenge history.

episodes.name: Strike a Pose, There's Something to It
episodes.overview: Drama erupts after a challenger's steamy hookup is revealed, and her romance with another player is in jeopardy when he's voted into eliminations.

episodes.name: Best Friends For Never
episodes.overview: A friendship is broken apart as the pressure of the game intensifies, and one competitor suffers an unexpected injury that could eliminate all hopes of winning.

episodes.name: Talk To The Hand
episodes.overview: The winners of this week's challenge face a difficult decision during voting and the result of the Draw pits two tough females against each other in an epic elimination round.

episodes.name: The $350,000 Pyramid
episodes.overview: The eight remaining players travel to Chile and are subjected to one last elimination twist to secure their spot in the final. As the challenge kicks off in the rough rapids, one team struggles to stay afloat.

episodes.name: A Walk In The Clouds
episodes.overview: On the last leg of the challenge, the final six competitors face brutal conditions and are pushed to their limits in a race to summit an active volcano and take home the $350,000 prize money.

episodes.name: Free Agents Reunion
episodes.overview: Can Laurel and CaraMaria ever mend their best friendship? Will Bananas school Jordan on earning his stripes? And just who will Cohutta be asking to the Prom? Plus some hilarious unseen stories, new rivalries, and more.

25.name: Free Agents
25.overview: The Challenge: Free Agents is the 25th season of the MTV reality game show, The Challenge. The season is located in Uruguay and Chile, with former cast members from MTV's The Real World and The Challenge competing. This season marks the first since season 12 that does not include any cast members from The Real World: Austin or the first Fresh Meat challenge. The season follows a new format, featuring each contestant competing in either teams, pairs or for themselves, for a share of $350,000 in prize money.

episodes.name: Where Is the Love?
episodes.overview: The competitors arrive in Panama in the Season 26 premiere.

episodes.name: I Will Always Hate You
episodes.overview: There is a budding romance in the house; tensions rise between veteran teams; a pair who cannot get over the past struggles to work together.

episodes.name: Love Sick
episodes.overview: Diem's condition forces her and CT to leave the game; past rivalries resurface; veteran teams are in the hot seat.

episodes.name: Crazy Stupid Love
episodes.overview: There are surprising hook-ups after a scandalous night out; one player has unrequited feelings of love for her partner.

episodes.name: Love, Sweat, and Tears
episodes.overview: The ongoing feud between two power couples reaches a climax at eliminations, thereby causing strife in the house.

episodes.name: Love Hurts
episodes.overview: A couple reach their boiling point.

episodes.name: That's the Way Love Goes
episodes.overview: The teams' confidence unravels after enduring a stressful trivia test; a power couple makes a risky move during nominations.

episodes.name: Total Eclipse of the Heart
episodes.overview: The "Battle of the Ex-iled" reigning champions are revealed, and drama erupts, changing the dynamics of the game.

episodes.name: Lovers in the Dark
episodes.overview: The first night time challenge brings the teams to new heights; a power couple tears apart their alliance.

episodes.name: Bye Bye, Love
episodes.overview: As the teams travel to Norway, one player lashes out so badly, they may be sent home before the last elimination.

episodes.name: The Greatest Love of All
episodes.overview: The remaining teams embark on the two-day final in an effort to win the prize money; contestants face brutal obstacles.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The top six teams reunite to discuss the biggest moments of the season, including challenge twists, hookups and rivalries.

episodes.name: The S... They Should've Shown
episodes.overview: Unseen footage includes boys vs. girls prank wars, wild animals on the loose and Zach in his birthday suit.

26.name: Battle of the Exes II
26.overview: The Challenge: Battle of the Exes II is the 26th season of MTV's reality game show, The Challenge, and the sequel to the show's 22nd season, Battle of the Exes. Filming occurred in Pedasí, Panama and Ørsta, Norway in August and September 2014, with former cast members from MTV's The Real World, The Challenge, and Are You the One? competing

episodes.name: There Will Be Blood
episodes.overview: The cast arrives in Turkey, and learns they will be competing alongside their families; a scandalous hookup occurs; brothers clash.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: Players must face their fears; one team begins to crack under the pressure; personal attacks lead to an emotional meltdown.

episodes.name: Camilanator: Judgement Day
episodes.overview: A shocking twist changes the whole game; two players end up in the hospital following a dangerous challenge.

episodes.name: Corneesa
episodes.overview: Cara Maria's ex enters the game with his brother; a veteran confronts her rookie hookup, and hears difficult confessions.

episodes.name: A House Divided
episodes.overview: The divide between the veterans and a team of rookies comes to a head; KellyAnne's allegiance sets another veteran off and their insults cross the line.

episodes.name: Dirty Little Secret
episodes.overview: One team's performance falls apart when they fail to communicate during the challenge; Bananas pulls a jaw-dropping move that makes the entire house question his loyalty.

episodes.name: Blood Brothers
episodes.overview: Abram confronts Cara Maria and reaches a boiling point; voting results fuel existing animosity; an intense elimination ensues.

episodes.name: Blood Is Thicker Than Mud
episodes.overview: CT and Diem's sister Faith join the cast to pay tribute to Diem and Knight; Bananas worries that his strategy is backfiring.

episodes.name: Blood Versus Love
episodes.overview: The Challengers must hold their breath in a terrifying underwater challenge as they compete for the last time in two large teams. Players are shocked when CT and Zach arrive in the game.

episodes.name: Out For Blood
episodes.overview: Players are reunited with their bloodline teammates and must compete in a grueling endurance challenge with shocking results. TJ stuns the competitors with news of a location change.

episodes.name: Tear Down This Wall
episodes.overview: After arriving in Berlin, tension causes players to lash out at one another; competitors must race across speeding trucks.

episodes.name: True Blood
episodes.overview: THe final three teams learn they will be competing in a major city; winnings are on the minds of the players while they prepare for the finale.

episodes.name: Family Matters
episodes.overview: The competitors endure demanding checkpoints and battle each other for their share of the prize; one pair is crowned the winner.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Hosted by Nessa. The cast members who attended the reunion were Cara Maria, Jamie, Jenna, Brianna, Bananas, Vince, Cory, Mitch, Aneesa, Rianna, Nany, Nicole, Abram, and KellyAnne.

episodes.name: The cast shares unaired footage from the season.
episodes.overview: The S#!@ They Should Have Shown

27.name: Battle of the Bloodlines
27.overview: ​​​This season just got VERY personal. We've seen rivals, exes, veterans, rookies, and even free agents earn their victories on The Challenge. Now, fourteen players from MTV series will travel to Bodrum, Turkey to join the people who know their toughest strengths, crippling weaknesses, and deepest fears better than anyone -- their own flesh and blood. In this unprecedented format, competitors will battle it out WITH and AGAINST their bloodlines, turning family into foe. This shake-up gets even more twisted when players learn that their fates are combined with their bloodlines'. It's anyone's game when family still means everything, because despite strong performances, competitors could still go home if their relatives fall short. With $350,000 on the line and family honor to defend, there will be blood.

episodes.name: Mexican Standoff
episodes.overview: In the Season 28 premiere, the contestants learn that they must work with their worst enemies.

episodes.name: The Curse of the Black Skull
episodes.overview: The competitors enter the Elimination Jungle for the first time.

episodes.name: The Replacements
episodes.overview: Two replacements enter the house; and the contestants work with their rivals in an intimate challenge.

episodes.name: I'm Going Home
episodes.overview: T.J. tosses a fiesta for the competitors; and a rumor threatens to turn friends into enemies.

episodes.name: Where The Ratchet Things Are
episodes.overview: After a name-calling fight, one cast member must choose between helping their best friend or having their teammate's back; TJ brings in a replacement team.

episodes.name: The Naked Truth
episodes.overview: During a rigorous challenge, a cast member's cheating ways could cost their team a chance to continue in the game.

episodes.name: Camilanator: Salvation
episodes.overview: An unexpected call from home shatters one challenger's chances in the game. Another team must decide who their real friends are when picking who to throw into the Jungle.

episodes.name: Stand by Me
episodes.overview: A late-night incident threatens to turn physical; and the contestants are taken aback by the serious implications. In other events, the cast is pulled into a last-minute challenge

episodes.name: Let Sleeping Dogs Wake
episodes.overview: Sleep deprived and broken, the house begins to divide; teams band together to plot against other roommates.

episodes.name: Digging Your Own Grave
episodes.overview: When one team tries to keep an alliance under wraps, their exposure threatens to derail trust, friendships, and families within the Challenge house. Pairs must prove they can think like their partners when their lives depend on it.

episodes.name: Rivals: Civil War
episodes.overview: When two teams are sent home, the remaining Challengers must step up to keep their feet in the game.

episodes.name: Raging Bullies
episodes.overview: The rivals must work hand-in-hand in their last Mexican challenge to avoid elimination before heading to Mendoza, Argentina.

episodes.name: Grapes. Wrath.
episodes.overview: One final elimination will determine which three pairs will continue on to the final challenge; participants are in for a surprise.

episodes.name: Split Decision
episodes.overview: A twist adds to the stakes of the final challenge; the remaining Challengers go all-in for a chance at the prize money.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Hosted by Nessa. The cast members who attended the reunion were Bananas, Sarah, Vince, Jenna, Devin, Cheyenne, Dario, Nicole, Wes, Nany, Nate, Cory, Ashley, and Camila.

28.name: Rivals III
28.overview: They’ve been pissed off. They’ve been wronged. They’ve been betrayed. And now they want vengeance! Rivals is back and the stakes couldn’t be higher! Twenty-six fan-favorites from The Challenge, The Real World, and Are You The One will head to exotic Mexico and be paired up with their biggest enemy! However...this time around the game has a shocking twist – players will be paired up with their rival – of the opposite sex! These guys and girls must figure out a way get over their bad blood as they compete in a series of heart-pounding challenges in order to earn a share of the massive $350,000 prize! Tempers will rise, passions will flare, and pride will be on the line in the most shocking season of The Challenge yet!

episodes.name: Gimmie Shelter
episodes.overview: Eighteen eager Underdogs arrive in Thailand and are shocked to be living in a run-down hut called The Shelter. While the players adjust to their living conditions, the Champions prepare to invade the game.

episodes.name: Skeletal Fracture
episodes.overview: Kailah finds herself universally disliked and must figure out how to survive being considered the game’s most hated player. Sylvia struggles with loyalty to her friendships versus the pressures of her alliance.

episodes.name: Helter Shelter
episodes.overview: Cory takes a big risk in order to earn his ticket to The Oasis. One player’s nerves become too much to handle at a terrifying elimination.

episodes.name: Four Tickets To Paradise
episodes.overview: Paranoia gets the best of Shane and causes him to lash out. LaToya and Nelson bond as the last four tickets to the Oasis are awarded and the players are ecstatic to finally move out of The Shelter.

episodes.name: Underdog Eat Underdog World
episodes.overview: The Underdogs are shocked to see the Champions enter the game; Nelson rages after a rejection; after wetting the bed, a player loses her suitor.

episodes.name: The Mile-High Club
episodes.overview: Nelson flies into a rage when things don't go his way; a player wets her bed, dousing the affections of her handsome suitor; and Jenna hopes to rekindle a relationship with her ex-boyfriend, Zach.

episodes.name: Achy Breaky Heart
episodes.overview: When Ashley spots Hunter flirting with a Champion, she questions their romance. The Champions vow to even out the bank accounts at the "Roll With The Punches" challenge. Bananas makes a suspicious move to save himself.

episodes.name: A Low Down Dirty Shane
episodes.overview: The competitors must endure a spicy curry eating challenge that sends tempers flaring. The Underdogs question if they can trust Shane, when he is suspected of making multiple alliances.

episodes.name: An Officer and a Gentlewoman
episodes.overview: Flirtatious Nicole vows that she can hook up with both Cara Maria and Laurel, but her plans go awry. The pranksters are revealed causing all hell to break loose between the girls on each team.

episodes.name: Go Your Own Way
episodes.overview: The Underdog alliances begin to unravel; Hunter's motives for flirting with Ashley are questioned; TJ surprises the competitors with a twist.

episodes.name: The Bloodbath
episodes.overview: The Underdogs must prove they are worthy of the final; a friendship turns into a rivalry when suspicious game-play is revealed.

episodes.name: Caged
episodes.overview: With only four players remaining on each team, The Champions and Underdogs must rely on their teammates to navigate a tricky maze course. In-fighting among the Champs leaves tempers flaring right before their last elimination.

episodes.name: A River of Endless Light
episodes.overview: A meltdown threatens to break apart the Underdog team. An ancient Thai lantern festival prompts reflection among the Challengers. TJ shocks everyone with a twist to the Final that no one saw coming.

episodes.name: Math Is Hard
episodes.overview: Camila and Cory’s love affair is put to the ultimate test when they must work together in the Final. The Underdogs and Champs must rely on each other in order to finish the Final.

episodes.name: The True Champions
episodes.overview: After a grueling three-day Final, the winners of Invasion of the Champions are revealed. Will an Underdog earn the title of Champ? Or will a Champ remain on top?

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Our Champs and Underdogs gather to discuss all the explosive moments of the past season including remaining rivalries, salvaged friendships, hot hook-ups, secrets, and some unbelievable unseen footage. Hosted by The Miz.

29.name: Invasion of the Champions
29.overview: In Season 29, Invasion of the Champions, 18 Underdogs battle across a series of contests for the chance to move out of squalor and into typical Challenge luxury, The Oasis! Just when the lucky ones get comfortable, they’ll find the game is far from over. The final crop of Underdogs will have to face down eight proven Champions for their share at the $350,000 prize. With devastating elimination rounds, truly baffling hookups and the first-ever three-day final on the way, Season 29 may just prove to be the most unpredictable and gripping yet!

episodes.name: Thirty Rotten Scoundrels
episodes.overview: In the Season 30 premiere, 30 of the dirtiest players in "Challenge" history arrive in Cartagena, Colombia, to compete for $1,000,000 in the most conniving and deceitful season ever.

episodes.name: Shots Fired!
episodes.overview: The eliminated players from “The Purge” learn that their fate is not yet sealed. When dirty-flirty Cory gets caught trying to juggle three of his past conquests, it puts a huge target on his back. CT enters the game, ready to shake things up.

episodes.name: Pride Before The Fall
episodes.overview: Cory's "hit list" threatens the other players, putting a target on his back; the players are shocked when TJ reveals a dirty twist to eliminations—the Double Cross.

episodes.name: Dirty Deeds
episodes.overview: After a wild night out on the town, two players face major consequences. The winner's circle hatches a plot to separate best friends and strong competitors, Jenna and Kailah. One player sends shockwaves through the house with a dirty, boss power play.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption
episodes.overview: The Challengers learn that the eliminated players have been biding their time until they reenter the house. Revenge consumes the minds of those in the Redemption House when they learn that they will be competing to get back in the game.

episodes.name: YAAAASS, Booty!
episodes.overview: The players must team up during the "Pirates Booty" challenge. A dirty insult crosses the line and turns the entire house against one of the strongest players in the game.

episodes.name: Ankles Aweigh
episodes.overview: One player's alleged "injury” raises doubts and the Challengers question whether it's actually deceitful strategy. When two veteran players get cozy, the nature of their relationship is called into question.

episodes.name: Dirty Little Secret
episodes.overview: The underdog alliance, Hunter and Cory, is forced to face off in elimination. The Challengers take part in TJ's favorite challenge — trivia. Two Challengers are caught in a dirty, compromising position.

episodes.name: Rampage
episodes.overview: When a not-so-secret kiss sends shockwaves through the house, one Challenger struggles to cope with his actions that could threaten relationships back home.  A physically demanding elimination requires more than just strength from the Challengers.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
episodes.overview: Tony struggles to cope with actions that could threaten his relationship at home. When Aneesa discovers that the Main House has deemed her the devil, she vows to come back and make everyone's life a living hell.

episodes.name: The Heart is a Lonely Hunter
episodes.overview: A call from home rocks one player’s game, making them question whether to continue on in the game. Unresolved tension between two players escalates into a war of words. One Challenger’s morals are put to the test.

episodes.name: Boxed In
episodes.overview: Two close friends must face off in a twisted elimination. A Redemption House twist shocks the players. A surprise in the game allows the winners of the challenge to make an unprecedented power move.

episodes.name: Feel the Burn
episodes.overview: When one Challenge diva feels like she is being silenced, she pulls a master-class political move that changes the entire game. A unexpected dirty move at the Double Cross blindsides one player.

episodes.name: Pretty Little Backstabbers
episodes.overview: A call from home rocks one player’s game, making them question whether to continue on in the game. Unresolved tension between two players escalates into a war of words. One Challenger’s morals are put to the test.

episodes.name: A Million More Reasons
episodes.overview: The remaining Redemption House players compete in a winner-take-all challenge, sending a bunch of heavy hitters packing. TJ blows everyone's minds when he reveals he's been lying to them all along, and they're really competing for one million dollars

episodes.name: The Sinister Six
episodes.overview: The remaining players compete for the last spots in the million-dollar final challenge and head to a new location to start the race. One player's crash landing jeopardizes their chances at the big money.

episodes.name: One in a Million
episodes.overview: The Finalists brave the elements and extreme altitude as they race through the mountains of Argentina with a million dollars in prize money at stake. At the finish line, TJ has one last dirty trick up his sleeve

episodes.name: Finale (1)
episodes.overview: Tensions reach full boil as the cast gathers to discuss all the explosive, extreme and ex-communcating moments of the Dirty 30 season.  And for the first time, our finalists are finding out who's winning their share of one million dollars!

episodes.name: Finale (2)
episodes.overview: Our scandalous Dirty 30 cast members continue to dish out and discuss rivalries, salvaged friendships, hottest hook-up's, and secret alliances. And our four finalists find out who is getting their dirty hands on their share of one million dollars!

episodes.name: The Final Dirt
episodes.overview: Hosted by "the Miz" this behind the scenes special will reveal our casts pre-show jitters, uncensored reality moments, and most importantly- what goes down at the after party!

30.name: XXX: Dirty Thirty
30.overview: To celebrate the 30th season of The Challenge, MTV is bringing back the dirtiest and most unpredictable players in The Challenge history for the biggest prize ever - $1 MILLION DOLLARS! This devious bunch will stop at nothing to win the game and compete against each other on The Challenge XXX: Dirty 30. Fifteen men and fifteen women will have to fight their way through some of the craziest, most daring challenges yet. And with this devious assortment of players, the backstabbing and masterminding will be just as intense off the field as on the field. Trust. No. One.

episodes.name: When Worlds Collide
episodes.overview: Past feuds and grudges comes back to haunt 28 eager Challenge competitors, all vying for their share of $500,000. Romance is in the air at the Challenge house, but so is revenge, as the players plot their next moves.

episodes.name: The Power of Three
episodes.overview: When three players earn power, their vendettas worry about becoming easy targets. Marie’s romance with Kyle is threatened by her enemy, Cara Maria. TJ reveals a massive new twist that will explode the game.

episodes.name: #banatalie
episodes.overview: Natalie balances a budding romance with her desire to prove herself as a strong competitor. An injured Melissa finds comfort with Nicole, but her true motives are questioned by her vendetta, Kayleigh.

episodes.name: Pizzagate
episodes.overview: While Challenge couple Brad and Britni plan on winning the game, players begin to plot their demise behind their backs. A player is caught stealing and generates a new vendetta.

episodes.name: Guilty by Association
episodes.overview: When one of the players falls ill, their true strength in the game is tested. Kayleigh is fed up with her vendetta Melissa, whose antics culminate in an explosive fight that rocks the Challenge house.

episodes.name: Notes on a Scandal
episodes.overview: A mysterious player leaves mean notes in the girls’ room, causing havoc with their game as they all try to figure out the culprit. The bromance between Victor and Shane fractures into a newfound vendetta.

episodes.name: Pulling the Strings
episodes.overview: When the mysterious and offensive notes continue to circulate the Challenge house, they cause a stir among the female competitors and the culprit finally gets revealed; when four Challenge legends return, the game turns upside-down.

episodes.name: Mercenaries of Mayhem
episodes.overview: Challenge legends continue to wreak havoc on the game. One player uses the power of the grenade to threaten the competition, creating a powerful vendetta in the process.

episodes.name: Baskets of Deplorables
episodes.overview: One player's humiliating performance may cost her the game when she gets shamefully stuck in a basket; Devin vows to wage war against his enemy, Bananas.

episodes.name: Rumor Has It
episodes.overview: When a secret hookup is exposed, two romances are shattered and the entire house is turned upside down. Tony struggles with making a huge game decision.

episodes.name: It's Britni, B...
episodes.overview: A player is left stunned by a shocking betrayal. Two scorned lovers form a bond, but their friendship is quickly tested by a dirty game move.

episodes.name: Help Me, Rhonda
episodes.overview: With the finale rapidly approaching, TJ stuns the competitors with news of a location change; they must first endure a grueling time trial to move forward.

episodes.name: Czechmate
episodes.overview: When one player is blindsided, a surprising new vendetta is formed; players compete in the high octane challenge, "Outside the Box" which will determine who is moving on to the Finals.

episodes.name: Vendettas Never Die
episodes.overview: With $500,000 on the line, the eight finalists compete for their share of the big money. However, two mercenaries return to make their road that much harder.

episodes.name: Finale (1)
episodes.overview: After facing one of the most intense mental and physical final challenges ever, the vicious "Vendettas" cast members are reunited for the greatest, grimiest grudge-fest in MTV history.

episodes.name: Finale (2)
episodes.overview: The insanity and intensity continues in the second hour of the Finale with the most feuds and fights in the history of The Challenge. Our four finalists will find out who will be crowned the solo champion for the first time

31.name: Vendettas
31.overview: Twenty-eight players including stars from MTV UK’s Ex on the Beach and Geordie Shore along with contestants from Big Brother join The Challenge fan favorites as they travel to Spain to pursue their personal vendettas against one another. And this season, for the very first time, every player is out solely for themselves not their team.

episodes.name: Six Feet Under
episodes.overview: Pairs of Vendettas must face their final reckoning when they are teamed up to compete for a million dollar prize. The past comes back to haunt two players, leading to a brawl with potentially severe consequences.

episodes.name: The Young and the Wreckless
episodes.overview: Kam and Kayleigh’s fate in the game is revealed. Players wonder if exes Britni and Chuck may still have some unresolved feelings for one another. Bananas gains a new love interest and a deceitful partner.

episodes.name: Crazy Ex-Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Kyle's jealousy over Cara Maria's flirtation with Paulie brings him closer to Faith and threatens to impact the game; Shady Shane's social media meltdown may leave him targeted for elimination.

episodes.name: The Affair
episodes.overview: TJ stuns everyone with the return of the Double Cross. The players in the Redemption House have the chance to re-enter the game. Paulie reveals shocking information that will put a relationship to the test.

episodes.name: Breaking Brad
episodes.overview: A furious CT lays into Veronica, putting their partnership in jeopardy; an unsettled Brad grows anxious after Paulie's accusation about Britni and Chuck; a terrifying challenge with dire consequence leaves a lot at stake.

episodes.name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
episodes.overview: Brad struggles to move past the rumors about Britni and Chuck, CT strategizes, and Kyle screws over Cara Maria -- twice.

episodes.name: Big Little Lies
episodes.overview: Queen Kam devises an elaborate plan that rocks the house and tests her royalty status. TJ proves yet again that he is the dirtiest player in the game when he drops a massive twist that will change the game.

episodes.name: Shaneless
episodes.overview: Shane takes shadiness to a whole new level when he stirs up drama in the house and then later on the playing field; Faith is dealt shocking news that changes how she views her tryst with Kyle.

episodes.name: Bro-ing Pains
episodes.overview: A torturous elimination shocks the players and sends the losers to an angry Redemption House. An unforgettable Double Cross promises to shake up the game.

episodes.name: Redemption House of Cards
episodes.overview: When one team pulls the Double Cross, a player takes politicking to a whole new level when he tries to flirt his way to safety; a disgusting meal awaits the players at the "Dunking For Dinner" challenge.

episodes.name: You're the Worst
episodes.overview: Tensions boil over between Cara Maria and the Lavender Ladies, leaving Marie in the middle of her friends and her vendetta partner; at the "Sky Bridge" challenge, the players must rebuild both their trust and a perilous rope bridge.

episodes.name: Unhappy Days
episodes.overview: One player is shaken when their partner hurls an unforgivable insult at them; the players find themselves locked up and puzzled at the "Caged In challenge"; at the "Tread Lightly Elimination," a shocking match-up has tremendous impact.

episodes.name: The People vs. Johnny Bananas
episodes.overview: A plot by the Lavender Ladies and Team Young Buck to topple Johnny Bananas spins wildly out of control, resulting in the most shocking elimination of the season so far.

episodes.name: Lavender Is the New Black
episodes.overview: After the results of the last wild elimination, the Lavender Ladies' loyalty toward one another is put to the test; Sylvia head-butts Marie...really.

episodes.name: Wheel of Fortune
episodes.overview: Bananas and Tony struggle with being the odd men out in the game. A twist in the Double Cross leads to a twisted plan that blow up in one team’s face. Two results of the elimination round send shockwaves through the game.

episodes.name: The Leftovers
episodes.overview: A night ends in total chaos as simmering tensions throughout the game finally boil over. The players face off in “Hit List” where their trivia skills are put to the test.

episodes.name: Scandal
episodes.overview: Rumors and gossip become one team’s secret weapon when their backs are against the wall. Surprising outcomes at the “Heads Will Roll” challenge have lasting implications on the game.

episodes.name: It’s Always Sunny in South Africa
episodes.overview: The Redemption House erupts when enemies come face to face. A season-long grudge match is finally settled when two power-house teams must battle for survival. Players compete in the “Rolling Thunder” challenge.

episodes.name: The Walking Dead
episodes.overview: Alliances are dissolved as every team fights to earn their way into the Finals. Paulie and Cara Maria’s season-long flirtation turns into something more. TJ reveals a shocking twist regarding the Final Challenge.

episodes.name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
episodes.overview: The Challengers come face to face with their ultimate Final Reckoning as the four remaining teams of Vendettas compete to take home the million dollar prize in a grueling, epic, and completely shocking Final Challenge.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: After facing the one of most intense seasons in Challenge history, the Final Reckoning cast reunites with their vendettas one last time to rehash this season's biggest backstabs, blowups, hookups, and more.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: The insanity and intensity continues in the second hour of the Finale with the most feuds and fights in the history of The Challenge. Our four finalists will find out who will be crowned the solo champion for the first time.

episodes.name: CT's Getting Married (1)
episodes.overview: Challenge All-Star CT is planning to get married to Lili, the mother of his young son, CJ – but, his family doesn’t support his engagement and he’s not sure they will show up at the wedding.

episodes.name: CT's Getting Married (2)
episodes.overview: What should be one of the most exciting, emotional and heartwarming times of CT’s life is becoming the most confrontational and heartbreaking.

32.name: Final Reckoning
32.overview: The thirty-second season features alumni from Real World, Road Rules, The Challenge, Are You the One?, the U.S. version of Big Brother, and the U.K. television shows Ex on the Beach and Geordie Shore, competing along with, for the first time, alumni from Bad Girls Club and Vanderpump Rules who appeared on the U.S. version of Ex on the Beach.

episodes.name: Apocalypse Now
episodes.overview: Epic Challenge Veterans meet up with eager Prospects, reality titans from around the globe, to take on the most grueling season yet; a twist in the game shakes up the power structure, leaving the players stunned.

episodes.name: Hellraiser
episodes.overview: Challengers battle head-to-head in the exhausting "Arms-a-geddon Tired" challenge; two teams wrestle for survival in a brutal elimination; Bananas performs an exorcism on a player that he deems "the spawn of Satan."

episodes.name: Casualties of War
episodes.overview: Zach makes a shocking move at the "Search and Destroy" challenge that makes everyone question his loyalties; Wes sets his sights on his mortal enemy, Bananas, but his attack may be premature.

episodes.name: Its Complicated
episodes.overview: Players take tragic slams during the “Fallout” challenge. Kyle and Paulie continue their never-ending war over Cara Maria, but this time while wearing silly costumes. A twist during the elimination shocks the competitors.

episodes.name: The Greatest Showman
episodes.overview: War is on between allies when one teammate quits on their partner during the "Tired Out" challenge; Bear riles up the house and makes an enemy out of Ninja Natalie; players battle for survival in the dark during the "Lights Out" challenge.

episodes.name: In Love and War
episodes.overview: Wes concocts a plan to drive a wedge into the Brits' alliance, Leroy's jealousy rages when Kam flirts with Theo, and the Killing Floor takes two more victims.

episodes.name: This Means War
episodes.overview: The players on the US side start to worry that the UK alliance is growing too strong. Challengers’ fears are put to the test as they are blindfolded hundreds of feet in the air. One player reveals a secret attraction.

episodes.name: Liar, Liar
episodes.overview: When Bear gets caught up in web of lies that threatens his relationship with Georgia, he devises a devious plan to win her back; Wes worries about his partner, Dee, and her lack of swimming skills at the "Brain Freeze" challenge.

episodes.name: American Psycho
episodes.overview: Hunter enlists Wes' help in repairing his relationship with Georgia; players must communicate with extreme precision while jumping between speeding trucks during the "Road Warrior" challenge; TJ stuns the remaining teams.

episodes.name: To All the Partners I've Loved Before
episodes.overview: The rules of the game have changed, the competitors must readjust their strategies; a cocky Hunter dares to test Turbo's temper; players are blown away by the "Fandemonium" challenge.

episodes.name: A Simple Plan
episodes.overview: Political mastermind Wes devises a bold plan that shakes up the remaining players; Nany and Cara Maria have a heated argument; the players compete in the terrifying "Highway to Hell" challenge.

episodes.name: Lost in Translation
episodes.overview: A surprising argument during the “Day of Reckoning” challenge creates unexpected rivalries. Paulie debates a risky move in order to eliminate Kyle. After a poor performance in the challenge, one player packs their bags and threatens to quit the game.

episodes.name: Final Destination
episodes.overview: Two competitors compete in the infamous and brutal elimination, "Hall Brawl." Players must face their worst fears in the turbulent challenge "Crash Landing". Turbo seeks vengeance on those who wronged him.

episodes.name: The Waterboy
episodes.overview: With the Finals on the horizon, competitors must face the “Judgement Day” challenge, where two players will be purged from the game. Desperate to secure his spot in the Finals, Paulie goes for broke.

episodes.name: Death Race
episodes.overview: The eight remaining players endure one of the hardest Finals in Challenge history, but not everyone will make it to the end of the day. A never before seen twist shocks the challengers and changes the game completely.

episodes.name: This is the End
episodes.overview: Those who remain battle it out for their share of the $1,000,000 prize purse. One player will be crowned champion of War of the Worlds.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: After one of the most barbaric seasons, the vets and prospects of The Challenge: War of the Worlds reunite for the first time in London to battle out the shocking betrayals, savage gameplays, and hottest hookups of this season.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: The drama continues in the surprise-packed Part 2 of The Challenge: War of the Worlds Reunion as loyalties are questioned, relationships are tested, and cheating scandals are exposed.

33.name: War of the Worlds
33.overview: In season 33, War of the Worlds, America's best will be taking on competitors from around the globe. Legendary Challenge Veterans will team up with Rookies from “The Bachelor,” “Big Brother” and other reality shows to compete for $1 million in the most grueling, physical and mental challenges ever devised. Who will survive?

episodes.name: The British Are Coming!
episodes.overview: Contestants endure challenges, elimination rounds, hookups, and rivalries for the chance at money.

episodes.name: God Save the Queen
episodes.overview: Jordan calls a meeting for Team U.S., the Cryptic Crossbow challenge reveals one team's weaknesses, a competitor makes a bold move, and the Proving Ground heats up.

episodes.name: United We Stand, Divided We Fall
episodes.overview: Bear vies for Team U.K.'s speaker position, the Paddle Wheel Puzzle challenge leaves one team questioning its tactics, and Wes and Josh clash over Team U.S.'s strategy.

episodes.name: Benedict Laurel
episodes.overview: The Relic Runner challenge forces the members of Team U.S. to reassess their allies, Bear juggles multiple romances, and the elimination leaves everyone in shock.

episodes.name: In Paulie We Trust
episodes.overview: Paulie strikes a deal with Bananas despite Cara Maria's wariness, Ninja's performance in the Hooked challenge raises suspicion, and Team U.S.'s loyalties are put to the test.

episodes.name: One Nation Under Leroy
episodes.overview: After Bananas's elimination, Leroy fills the alpha-sized hole on Team U.S., Dee and Rogan confront their feelings, and Team U.K. bombs the Explosive Decision challenge.

episodes.name: Zero Dark Turbo
episodes.overview: Team UK hopes to turn the tide against a dominant Team USA during the "Resilient River Run" challenge; Jordan says the wrong thing to Turbo,sparking a dangerous rivalry and a heated confrontation.

episodes.name: Saving Private Esther
episodes.overview: The teams stack crates to grab relics and avoid double elimination, the U.K. team worries about Esther's abilities, and alliance politics tests Dee and Ninja's friendship.

episodes.name: The Royal Rumble
episodes.overview: Tensions between Jordan and Turbo erupt into a full-blown war; Theo and Paulie get into a heated confrontation where Paulie gives Theo a tongue-lashing; a slippery puzzle causes players to crash into one another.

episodes.name: Infinity War
episodes.overview: Turbo and Jordan's confrontation send shockwaves through the game. In an attempt to win a season, Leroy firmly chooses an alliance, but it puts his friendship with Nany in jeopardy. Teams UK and USA have a muddy battle at the "Incoming" challenge.

episodes.name: All is Fair in Love and War
episodes.overview: Cracks continue to develop in the U.K. team, the game takes a toll on Nany, and a hard-fought Proving Ground ends with a huge surprise.

episodes.name: The Right Honorable Rogan
episodes.overview: Cara Maria skips Jordan and Tori's engagement party, Rogan and CT concoct a plan to eliminate Team U.K.'s weakest player, and the tribunal members are at odds.

episodes.name: Dee-Day
episodes.overview: A "Puzzling Swim" purge challenge sends shockwaves through the game; Dee sets out to prove that she is not the weak link; one player uses a brilliant strategy during the "End of the Rope" elimination.

episodes.name: Declaration of Independence
episodes.overview: CT is faced with a tough decision when it comes to the future of his UK team. Only one challenge and elimination separate players from Team USA and Team UK from the Finals. Two women battle it out in a unique elimination.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Countries
episodes.overview: The daunting Final begins, with both teams evenly matched. Endurance, puzzles, and math put Team USA and Team UK to the ultimate test. One player has a shocking and disastrous gas-out that threatens to sink their team.

episodes.name: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Cash
episodes.overview: Team USA wonders if it can still catch up with Team UK; a shocking twist spells doom for multiple players; the reveal of the million-dollar winners.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: The Challengers have returned from war to reunite in London to discuss this season’s savage betrayals, nuclear blowups, and every hookup. Hosted by Justina Valentina and NBA Champion Nick Young

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: The cast opens up to Justina Valentine and Nick Young about Rogan hooking up with Dee and Nany, Jordan picking a fight with Turbo and all the shady alliances from Season 34.

34.name: War of the Worlds 2
34.overview: Set in the middle of the jungle, “The Challenge: War of the Worlds 2” returns to a classic team format; 14 Brits will battle it out against 14 Americans for their share of the $1 million-dollar prize.

episodes.name: Mad World
episodes.overview: Players face an intimidating first challenge and then move into the most shocking living conditions in history; a new alliance threatens to topple the game while a stunning twist at elimination changes everyone's expectations.

episodes.name: Sweet Dreams Are Made of Dee
episodes.overview: Players compete in the Airdrop Extraction challenge; Rogan falls for a new player; Dee seeks to stand in the way.

episodes.name: A Hard Jay's Night
episodes.overview: The Challengers blow up trucks during the Decode and Detonate challenge; Jay finds himself in the middle of a dangerous love triangle that could result in his demise; Wes and Bananas' alliance faces its first true test.

episodes.name: Karma Chameleon
episodes.overview: Bear seeks to prove that no one can extinguish the fire that he has burning for Kailah; Ashley and Mattie get into a heated argument; the players compete in the freezing Cold War challenge, which proves too chilling for one person.

episodes.name: Break Up With Your BF I’m Bored
episodes.overview: During the "Bomb Squad" challenge, teams must work together to detonate an explosion. Rogan seeks vengeance on Jay. Jordan and Wes get into a heated argument involving deli meat.

episodes.name: Love Will Tear Us Apart
episodes.overview: Jenna struggles to maintain her tumultuous relationship at home while competing for a life-changing amount of money. A prank gone wrong threatens Bear & Kailah's budding romance. Players compete in a high-speed "Fast and Furious" inspired challenge.

episodes.name: Should I Stay Or Should I Go
episodes.overview: Tori believes that she is ready to earn her red skull. Nany's budding crush on one player causes tension in her friendship with Aneesa. Two players face off in the Dust-to-Dust elimination.

episodes.name: Live and Let Die
episodes.overview: Players must cope with toxic chemicals in the mind-bending "Decontamination" challenge. Wes and Bananas plot their biggest game move yet, but it may mean outing their secret alliance. A double elimination sends shockwaves.

episodes.name: Backstabber
episodes.overview: Players drop into the sewers during the unique "Tunnel Rats" challenge. When Dee contemplates a risky power play, it raises questions whether or not she can be trusted.

episodes.name: The Final Countdown
episodes.overview: Bananas and Wes' alliance comes to a crossroads as players realize that they may not have much longer to earn a Red Skull to make it into the finals. Players must compete in TJ's favorite game of each season: trivia.

episodes.name: You Ain't Right
episodes.overview: Bananas, Rogan, and Jenny hatch a plot to blindside Dee, but one emotional player might foil their plans. Josh calls out Swaggy for working with Wes. Two players get heated during the explosive "Flagged Down" challenge.

episodes.name: Pictures of You
episodes.overview: A furious challenger seeks revenge after utter betrayal. When Cory's daughter refuses to talk to him, it makes him even more motivated to make it to the Finals. Players compete in the grueling “Tanks A Lot” challenge.

episodes.name: Victim of Love
episodes.overview: Nany and Kaycee's budding relationship brings out a shocking side of Bayleigh, as well as some alleged tea about Kaycee and Bayleigh's past; two women compete for their Red Skull in the brutal Off With You Heads elimination.

episodes.name: Your Time is Gonna Come
episodes.overview: Aneesa worries that her Red Skull may be in jeopardy when players wonder if she has what it takes to run a Final. Fessy makes a questionable move against his alliance. A nighttime challenge and another double elimination shock.

episodes.name: Crash Into Me
episodes.overview: One player engages in sloppy political maneuvering, while another takes a shocking gamble to save a friend. Competitors must fight for survival in the elimination game "Hall Brawl".

episodes.name: It's the End of the World As We Know It
episodes.overview: After a season of grueling challenges and brutal eliminations, the nine finalists compete for their share of the $1 million prize.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The challengers reunite virtually for the first time since the finale to break down the strategy, expose the snakes and address the madness from this season.

episodes.name: Behind The Total Madness
episodes.overview: The Challengers are pulling back the curtains on the behind-the-scenes madness, hookups, and fails the fans didn’t know they were missing.

episodes.name: License to Killer Kam
episodes.overview: The agents compete in a frantic melee during their first mission. Kam plots against another player after being rejected, and a fiery first elimination upends everyone's strategies.

episodes.name: Dive Another Day
episodes.overview: The complete rules and true nature of this season's game are revealed. Agents re-evaluate their partnerships. An icy plunge devolves into a political stalemate, and Joseph calls out Wes.

episodes.name: Enemy of the State
episodes.overview: Fessy's exposed lies about the secret vote cause concern within his alliance. Agents must wrestle against each other on top of a speeding truck during an explosive "Mission: Road Kill" challenge. An emotional agent pushes two other players' buttons.

episodes.name: Duplicity
episodes.overview: Fessy's lies about the secret vote cause concern within his alliance. Agents battle each other on top of a speeding truck in a Mission: Road Kill challenge. An emotional agent pushes two other players past their breaking point.

episodes.name: Skyfall
episodes.overview: After one agent is unexpectedly deactivated, TJ institutes a shocking security breach, which shakes up partnerships. The agents compete in Mission Agent Down where they must overcome their fear of heights. A group of strong rookies align.

episodes.name: From Theresa with Love
episodes.overview: When rumors spread about Theresa's loyalties, she quickly becomes public enemy number one. A pair of strong agents find their partnership struggling during the arduous Mission Smuggle Run

episodes.name: Die Another Jay
episodes.overview: Fallout from a shocking blindside puts a target on a strong pair of agents. Devin presses an agent's button, resulting in another night of mayhem. Agents must face their fears while hanging off a helicopter during Mission Aerial Takedown

episodes.name: A Muddy Matter
episodes.overview: Aneesa and Olympian Lolo Jones get into a heated exchange during the muddy Mission All Brawl. CT starts to worry about his partnership with Big T. Amber M. becomes suspicious of one of her closest friends in the game.

episodes.name: Lady Vengeance
episodes.overview: One agent is put on blast after trying to appease both her alliance and her new group of friends. TJ forces the agents to participate in his favorite game, trivia, during Mission Interrogation. Old grudges resurface as two rivals go head to head.

episodes.name: A Clockwork Amber
episodes.overview: Two agents' attraction to one another heats up to a new level, while Lolo and Nam's relationship grows cold and distant. After a major win during Mission Black Sand Ops, the Double Agents struggle to get on the same page.

episodes.name: An Inconvenient Goof
episodes.overview: CT gets worried that he may be locked out for getting a gold skull and decides to train Big T for battle. One agent's unforgettable performance shocks everyone during the high-flying Mission Air Lift. TJ drops a bomb that no one saw coming.

episodes.name: Tinker, Tailer, Bunny, Spy
episodes.overview: The ramifications of TJ's twist sends shock-waves through headquarters. One agent finds themselves public enemy number one after a controversial game move. An injury causes a major setback for one player.

episodes.name: The Spy Who Loved Fessy
episodes.overview: Agents take part in the terrifying “Mission: Survive the Night”, where they must confront their worst fears. With gold skulls on the line, players question whether or not they have the right partners to survive.

episodes.name: The Best Of Enemies
episodes.overview: When two rivals becomes partners, they fear that their bad blood will keep them from winning. After losing what seems like thousands of partners and constantly being the rogue agent, Cory hopes to finally break his own curse.

episodes.name: Never Say Never Again
episodes.overview: Fragile male egos are on the line when two top dogs argue about who is the best player in the game. The last agent without a gold skull desperately hopes to finally earn a ticket into TJ's final. Agents must face a terrifying obstacle .

episodes.name: A Most Wanted Man
episodes.overview: When one agent learns she is at the bottom of her alliance, she realizes she must do whatever it takes in order to look out for herself. Two untrustworthy players must rely on each other to control a vote.

episodes.name: True Lies
episodes.overview: An "introverted" player makes a big, public announcement about their future as the finals draw near. TJ shows up at headquarters with a shocking request. Two players battle it out in the final elimination of the season.

episodes.name: No Time To Die
episodes.overview: the remaining eight agents arrive at tj’s final and begin their most grueling mission of the season. one team’s fate hangs in the balance after a shocking revelation.

episodes.name: The World Is Not Enough
episodes.overview: after a disastrous start to the final, one team worries if they can even continue on in the game. the remaining agents must persevere through mental and physical exhaustion in order to win their share of the one million-dollar prize.

36.name: Double Agents
36.overview: Season 36 returns to a partner format with 19 (!) espionage thriller-themed episodes shot in Iceland, pitting 30 returning and new competitors against each other "in a game of secrets, spies, and lies" for their share of the million-dollar prize.

episodes.name: The List
episodes.overview: TJ’s agents meet during a high stakes mission that will have a massive impact on the game. Love is in the air at headquarters, but some new romances may spell danger in the game. A scandalous list emerges and threatens to expose a strong player.

episodes.name: Bertha
episodes.overview: Agents take to the skies in the "Hell Heist" mission and a "mystery agent" joins the game. Nelly T gets himself into hot water when he start flirting with two different agents.

episodes.name: Truce or Dare
episodes.overview: An agent is tempted to ditch the Veteran Truce and exact revenge on an old rival.

episodes.name: Good Vibes and Gladiator
episodes.overview: The muddy "Mindfield" mission dirties up the game when players must use their brains and brawn in order to succeed; two Rookie players debate making a very risky move in order to secure a strong partner.

episodes.name: Alien
episodes.overview: The slow burning tension between Fessy, Josh, and Amber erupts into chaos; agents are taken for a spin during the dizzying Turning Agents mission; two players have a shocking secret hookup.

episodes.name: Uncle CT
episodes.overview: Agents are on edge when TJ comes to Headquarters with a stunning directive that changes the game. CT comes to a troubling realization about his partner, Berna. Players compete in the brutally epic elimination, "Rage Cage."

episodes.name: The Threat
episodes.overview: After the Veterans threaten the remaining Rookies, one bold Rookie comes up with a plan to detonate the Veteran’s stronghold. Berna calls out all of her rivals in an explosive manner. The competitors take on the deep seas during the “Dive Bomb" mission.

episodes.name: The War
episodes.overview: At long last, the Veteran War has arrived testing everyone’s loyalty. The muddy “Bombshell Battle” mission shows who is truly playing dirty. TJ shocks the agents at elimination with a massive twist that will change the game.

episodes.name: Precious Stones
episodes.overview: TJ's shocking twist is revealed at the "Diamond Dash" mission and the players struggle to adjust the new rules. Feeling like he is a constant target, one vet attempts to make a fresh start. Amanda is reminded of her reasons for fighting for the money.

episodes.name: Mucus Plug
episodes.overview: One player makes a devastating mistake at the “Satellite Sabotage” mission that could put his team in jeopardy. A Rookie makes a bold, but questionable, game move. Two players battle for survival in the classic elimination game, “Pole Wrestle."

Players commemorate the 500th episode of The Challenge with the physically demanding “Brush Contact” mission. Players get into a heated argument at the club. Players try to pressure one agent into volunteering for elimination in order to infiltrate cells.

episodes.name: Titanic
episodes.overview: Cory worries that as the game gets more cutthroat the Vets might turn on him. Players compete in the “Sunken Intelligence” mission, where one player’s lack of effort sinks their team’s chances of winning. One player’s loyalty is tested by a new bond.

episodes.name: Mavericks
episodes.overview: Agents must turn into mavericks in a Top Gun inspired mission. With her back against the wall, Amanda looks to secure her future in the game. When Josh goofs up and says too much, one player holds it against him during a tense nomination.

episodes.name: The Cave of the Wolf
episodes.overview: After a sneaky plan to sabotage one team is exposed during the “Boom Raiders” mission, massive rifts appear in numerous friendships. The Compromised Agent makes a bold move at the Lair as two fight for survival during the “Burning Bridges” elimination.

episodes.name: Riverdance
episodes.overview: Agents feel what it’s like to get their hands on one million dollars during an exhausting mission. Emy worries that the rivalry between her teammates could result in her going to elimination. Two agents' broken friendship gets tangled up in the game.

episodes.name: Drop Dead
episodes.overview: With the Finals approaching, players scramble to stay out of elimination. No one can predict who the Compromised Agent will choose to battle in The Lair. Just when the players think they are in the clear, TJ drops a bomb that puts everyone in danger.

episodes.name: Night of Mistakes
episodes.overview: TJ’s shocking twist sends the players into a panic as they battle for survival before the Final. One player finds themselves on blast for trying to help another player during a tight elimination. The remaining players begin TJ’s Final.

episodes.name: The Decision
episodes.overview: The remaining Challengers fight for their share of the $1,000,000 prize. A close relationship faces a devastating test. Agents are crowned winners of “Spies, Lies, and Allies” but are then faced with a daunting decision.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Maria Menounos gathers the agents to discuss Emy's plot to take CT from Berna and Amber's issues with the "Big Brother" alliance, and they finally learn who stole the frozen pizza.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Maria Menounos questions the agents about their on- and off-air hookups, Cory accuses Josh of making promises he couldn't keep, and the Rookie of the Year performs the song of the season.

37.name: Spies, Lies and Allies
37.overview: Set in the picturesque Mediterranean coast of Croatia, elite U.S. Agents join forces with an assortment of International Operatives, all armed with killer competitive instincts,” reads the official description. “With the assignment constantly evolving, these agents will be tested both mentally and physically to win their share of $1M in this epic new chapter of The Challenge spy games.

episodes.name: Don't Die for Me Argentina
