episodes.overview: The competition is off to the races as a romantic rendezvous creates a love triangle, a cocky competitor makes enemies, and a mole is revealed -- all before the first challenge.

episodes.name: Friend or Faux
episodes.overview: An iconic duo joins the game and shakes things up, Tori gets candid about her mental health, the players compete in Balancing Act, and Turbo holds on to old grudges while making new ones.

episodes.name: A Bumpy Ride
episodes.overview: The new Ride or Dies pair throws Tori for a loop, Tommy and Analyse seek allies, Johnny and Ravyn's dynamic threatens their vitality in the game, and two teams face off in elimination.

episodes.name: Olivin' on the Edge
episodes.overview: TJ keeps the surprises coming, several players pair off romantically, the daily challenge tests one vet's biggest fear, and a rookie team cuts a risky deal to stay out of elimination.

episodes.name: Get Rich or Ride or Die Tryin'
episodes.overview: The competitors throw an emo-themed house party, some costly mistakes shake up the competition during a relay challenge, and one team uses its power to go after a veteran player.

episodes.name: Come Michele or High Water
episodes.overview: Laurel moves on from Horacio to another housemate, Jakk regrets his former friendship with untrustworthy Jay, and Michele's choices leave her racked with guilt.

episodes.name: Deep Web
episodes.overview: Nelson makes new enemies, the housemates become suspicious of Devin's strategy, and two teams face off in a climbing and puzzle elimination.

episodes.name: Born to Ride or Die
episodes.overview: Bananas celebrates turning 40, the players jump on moving cars in Double Trouble, Nelson faces his toughest choice yet, and two teams try not to get Spun Out in elimination.

episodes.name: Split Decision
episodes.overview: After the intense mini-final challenge Haul or Nothing, one pair of Ride or Dies must make difficult decisions that will change the entire game.

episodes.name: Dancing on My Own
episodes.overview: Jordan's fling with Nurys upsets Tori, the players take on a challenge inspired by "Puss in Boots: The Last Wish," and cracks start to form in the foundation of Faysal's new team.

episodes.name: Nelly: Ride (or Die) Wit Me
episodes.overview: TJ runs a dizzying trivia challenge, Nurys comes clean with Tori about her relationship with Jordan, and two players face off in the Pato Brawl, an Argentinean update of the Pole Wrestle.

episodes.name: Frenemy of the State
episodes.overview: Devin tries inspiring his teammates to end their losing streak, the players hold on tight in Chopper Drop, and the elimination vote gets ugly when Tori and Jordan's feelings come into play.

episodes.name: Blind Faith
episodes.overview: Jordan faces blowback for his duplicitous elimination vote, the teams gamble in Blind Faith, and Faysal and Moriah's Ride or Die relationship begins to crack.

episodes.name: Terrorist of Love
episodes.overview: The players pair up for a vertigo-inducing challenge, Tori's fragile relationship with Jordan is threatened by one choice, and TJ changes the game's trajectory with the mother of all twists.

episodes.name: Knot a Problem
episodes.overview: Two pairs fight to get back into the game, Amber and Chauncey have a target on their backs, and players must solve a puzzle in the back of an out-of-control bus.

episodes.name: Friends or Froze
episodes.overview: The competitors determine who among them are most vulnerable, puzzle and communication skills are tested in Frozen Senseless, and two teams climb to the top in Bridge It.

episodes.name: Riders on the Storm
episodes.overview: Four pairs begin TJ's grueling 100-hour final challenge, and misfortune and miscommunication jeopardize the teams' chances of winning.

episodes.name: The Hours
episodes.overview: As the final continues, tempers flare as Devin and Tori try to maintain their lead, an injury sparks an explosive argument, and the challengers face a formidable feast.

episodes.name: The End of the Ride
episodes.overview: With 31 hours left in the final, three teams face a cornfield maze and Balls In for a last chance at $1 million in the ultimate test of their physical strength and intelligence.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Amber reveals a secret, Johnny, Ravyn and Nurys discuss their love triangle, and Olivia shares the severity of her facial injury.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Turbo sends a message, Faysal's comments about Moriah come to light, Tori and Jordan relive their confusing dynamic from this past season, and Nelson's honorable style of play is praised.

38.name: Ride or Dies
38.overview: In season 38 — Ride or Dies — players are paired with best friends, exes or partners for the first time ever as they navigate the weekly mental and physical warfare together for their share of one million dollars.

episodes.name: Teamwork Makes the Perfect Work
episodes.overview: TJ welcomes a pool of competitors who all have yet to win a championship, players get a chance to bank extra cash in Hole Control, and two housemates fight to avoid elimination in Fall Out.

episodes.name: Two Lungs, One Heart, Can't Lose
episodes.overview: The contenders go out on a limb in Ball Control, divides form in the house between U.S. and U.K. competitors, and one player is left surprised when their alliance doesn't keep them safe.

episodes.name: It's a Matter of Semantics
episodes.overview: Sideways glances lead to a blowup between two contenders, the teammates try to break their losing streak during Control Tower, and the women concoct a plan for mutual self-preservation.

episodes.name: I'm Coming Out
episodes.overview: The players put their swimming endurance to the test, the housemates throw a coming-out party for Big T, and one contender resists the temptation to cheat on their significant other.

episodes.name: Countdown to Chaos
episodes.overview: The next phase of the game approaches as the countdown clock nears zero, contenders split into pairs for Upside Down Whirled, and one player worries she's being targeted by an ally.

episodes.name: The Big Mistake
episodes.overview: Head on down to your local bingo hall because we're playing BINGO - Challenge Style. Contenders get down and dirty, and tensions mount as they wrestle for power. Another Champ enters, hoping to end one Contender's dream.

episodes.name: So Flip Floppy
episodes.overview: In a move of desperation, one contender tries to prove his loyalty to his alliance by betraying his other friends; love is in the air as one of the couples take their relationship to a new level.

episodes.name: Struggling to Hold It Together
episodes.overview: A rigorous and exhausting challenge sees one contender give their blood, sweat and tears for the win; an intense night out finds a contender in the firing line after another reaches their boiling point.

episodes.name: A Banana Split
episodes.overview: Cracks in the alliances begin to show themselves as one Contender works to flip the house vote. Multiple romantic scandals come to a head as one of the Contenders is confronted about being unfaithful.

episodes.name: Feeling Used
episodes.overview: The Contenders soar to new heights in a sky high challenge, with an outcome that makes one Contender question their alliance. A decorated Champion brings the heat in the elimination.

episodes.name: My Own Worst Frenemy
episodes.overview: One contender is shocked when their so-called alliance nominates them for elimination.

episodes.name: A Legend Returns
episodes.overview: The contenders fight for their lives high above the water! One Contender finds themselves on the outs with their alliance, while another attempts to change the power dynamic in the game. A long-awaited returning Champion shakes.

episodes.name: El Saboteur
episodes.overview: Chaos continues as a new alliance threatens to shift the power dynamics in the house.

episodes.name: Don't Let TJ Decide
episodes.overview: The end of Chaos is near and with alliances on the brink of collapse, a grueling mini-final awaits.

episodes.name: Welcome to Conquest
episodes.overview: The game intensifies as the contenders enter a new phase, leading to shocking new twists.

episodes.name: Family Knows Best
episodes.overview: A high-stakes challenge finds the Contenders hanging on for dear life. A tumultuous selection divides the house, forcing one Contender to choose between their closest allies.

episodes.name: Feel the Bern
episodes.overview: The remaining contenders fight to secure their chance to become the next Challenge Champion.

episodes.name: The Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: The final seven contenders enter the Final, where they must face the three levels of the game again.

episodes.name: Only One Gets the Crown
episodes.overview: The final six contenders compete for a place amongst the most esteemed competitors.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: The battle is over and now it's time for phase four - closure. Maria Menounos returns to uncover what went down behind-the-scenes of this season's chaos. Why did the entire house target Big T and Melissa? Who regrets playing Jay and Michele's game? And why did Olivia throw her bestie Nurys under the bus? Plus, the Champs are in the building to weigh-in on everything - do they think Emanuel is a worthy enough to join their ranks?

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: The chaos continues on part 2 of the Challenge: Battle for a New Champion Reunion. There was no shortage of betrayals, backstabbing, and blindsiding this season... Have Big T and Melissa forgiven Corey? Is the Parents' Alliance dead? Michele, Callum, and other house flings reveal where they stand post-show, and a shocking, never-before-seen hookup two challengers thought they hid is revealed. Plus, Moriah spills on why she moved on from Bananas and what happened when she returned home.

39.name: Battle for a New Champion
39.overview: Mental and physical limits will be pushed further than ever before as contenders must face off against rotating vets in surprise eliminations. With the stakes higher than ever, this new era of competitors must beat the best to be the best. In the end, who will solidify their legacy and emerge as a first-time champion?

episodes.name: The Era Invitational (1)
episodes.overview: The Challengers arrive at their first challenge, but are shocked when they learn they will start by competing within their eras; politics begin as players must plead their case to avoid seeing the biggest elimination night in challenge history.

episodes.name: The Era Invitational (2)
episodes.overview: The Challengers arrive to the Arena to see classic, brutal eliminations from each era awaiting them; 16 people will fight in the sand, only 8 will return; the losers learn they will be sent off with a parting gift of karma for the remaining players.

episodes.name: A Fatal Era
episodes.overview: After the large elimination, the eras must work together in order to keep their team safe from elimination; a gross feast awaits the competitors at their next challenge.

episodes.name: My Trivia Era
episodes.overview: Targets change the game as competitors must learn how to play without knowing if they’ll be safe come the next elim. TJ's favorite challenge returns in the form of a Challenge history lesson! A questionable sudden death round seeds internal doubt.

episodes.name: An Era Tradition
episodes.overview: An exhausting challenge leaves an era questioning one of their own while another era can't get on the same page and a long-standing rivalry between two teammates comes to a head and erupts.

episodes.name: My Real Friends Era
episodes.overview: A challenger must decide between righting their past wrongs or creating a new divide. Another player tries to protect a "friend" in their relationship, but only creates a problem for themself. An entire era grasps at anything to turn the game around.

episodes.name: Trust in Your Era
episodes.overview: The winners must make a heart-breaking decision as to which of their friends must fight in the elimination; target selection causes chaos as player numbers dwindle.

episodes.name: The Era of the Gladiator
episodes.overview: A battle erupts and the players must find their inner Gladiator to take out their competition and achieve glory and safety; a vote from one team causes friends to question whether they were ever on the same.

episodes.name: An Era of One
episodes.overview: Having seen their whole team lose in elimination, one challenger must hold their entire era on their back to earn safety; cracks in an alliance begin to form as relationships across eras create paranoia and uneasiness.

episodes.name: A New Era
episodes.overview: The game takes a huge turn as the Challengers must now work as individuals to claim victory, while still repping their era. A hot and grueling challenge has one person seeing double and another wishing they could use it as an excuse.

episodes.name: Payback Era
episodes.overview: The targets are painted on three friends as they must scrape through an intense obstacle course in order to keep themselves safe; one player decides to blow up anyone's game who stands in their way.

episodes.name: The Era of the Purge
episodes.overview: The Challengers get their first taste of what a final could look like, while battling to avoid being purged from the game; one Challenger tries to put the final nail in the coffin for their foe.

episodes.name: Best Friends 4Era
episodes.overview: A rivalry heats up and no one is safe from the chaos that ensues; one Challenger tries to reignite their competitive flame to avoid elimination; best friends avoid facing off with one another.
